Package clientGUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApproveCustomersGUIController
    ApproveCustomersGUIController class is responsible for allowing each shop manager to approve customers, by giving them username and password, and clicking approve customer button they will be recognized in the system and login to their accounts.
    CancelOrderPopUpGUIController
    Controller class for cancel order popup in MyOrders window
    CeoGUIController
    CeoGUIController class is responsible for allowing the CEO pick a desired action by clicking a button, either viewing specific shop reports or viewing annual report, both of the buttons will direct the CEO to new GUI.
    ClientConnectionWindowController
    Controller class of client connection window
    ComplaintReportGUIController
    Controller class for complaint report window
    CustomerGUIController
    Controller class for customer main window
    CustomerServicesGUIController
    Customer Serves Controller - made for users from type "customer serves", the controller 2 buttons, user can "Insert complaint"/"Review Survey", if there is an error, a suitable message will be shown.
    DeliveryGuyGUIController
    Delivery Guy Controller - made for users from type "delivery Guy", the controller include a big table with all order for specific user id User can confirm delivery in using the table, if there is an error, a suitable message will be shown.
    HelpPOPUPController
    controller class for help popup window in new order window
    IncomeReportGUIController
    Project Name: Zer-Li (Java Application Flower Store)
    InsertComplaintGUIController
    controller class for insert complaint window
    LoginGUIController
    controller class for login window
    ManageCustomersGUIController
    ManageCustomersGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to manage the customers belongs to his own shop by either freeze or unfreeze them, and this affects their login permission (frozen accounts can not log in while unfrozen - active - ones can), the shop manager can do the written above by selecting the customer and right after then choosing freeze/unfreeze button.
    ManagePermissionsGUIController
    ManagePermissionsGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to manage the permissions of each worker in the system - worker: any user that is not customer or CEO or shop manager - changing the permission means changing their position or job by editing type field in the table and right after then clicking confirm changes button.
    MarketingWorkerGUIController
    Marketing Worker Controller - made for users from type "Marketing Worker", the controller include 2 buttons, User can "Update catalog"/"Upload Survey Results" using specific window, if there is an error, a suitable message will be shown.
    MyOrdersGUIController
    Controller class for MyOrdersGUI.fxml
    MyOrdersOrderDetailsPOPUPController
    controller class for order details popup window in My Orders window
    NewOrderGUIController
    Controller class for new order window
    OrdersDetailsGUIController
    controller class for order details window
    PaymentGUIController
    controller class for payment window
    ReviewCancellationGUIController
    ReviewCancellationGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to confirm a cancellation request sent by a customer and updating the balance of the customer if he is refunded upon to an order cancellation, the shop manager needs to select the order he wants to approve its cancellation and then clicking confirm cancellation button.
    ReviewOrdersGUIController
    ReviewOrdersGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to confirm an order made by a customer that belongs to his shop, he/she does that by selecting the order and then clicking confirm order button.
    ReviewOrdersOrderDetailsPOPUPController
    controller class for order details popup in review orders window
    ReviewSurveyGUIController
    controller class for review survey window
    ShopManagerGUIController
    ShopManagerGUIController class is responsible for the main GUI of each shop manager, it allows them to pick one of six desired actions that are made for shop managers to manage customers, workers and viewing reports.
    SpeceficReportGUIController
    controller class for specific report window
    UpdateCatalogGUIController
    Update Catalog Controller - Marketing Worker can update catalog using this window, by applying discount for all items in catalog
    UploadSurveyResultsGUIController
    Upload Survey Result - Marketing Worker can upload survey result for customers using this window, user will be able to choose specific survey and then answer results
    ViewCatalogGUIController
    Controller class for ViewCatalogGUI.fxml file
    ViewMonthlyReportsGUIController
    controller class for view monthly report window
    ViewReportsGUIController
    controller class for view reports window
